WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Welcome to JeudiConfessionBot! 

To start, just hit Start(1 or 2 times) to continously receive tweets from #JeudiConfession Hashtag from Twitter.
HELP_MESSAGE:
Hi, here's how to use JeudiConfessionBot :
'You just need to start the bot, it will do the rest for you', 

> /start - For the presentation. 
> /help - To get more explanation of how to use it. 

If you still have a problem, please contact the developer @sanixdarker.
